item.title: Black Box Model Extraction
item.description:
Please go through the slides linked above or watch through our presentation below.

End to End Approach

Installation

$ pip install vidmodex ## Stable version
$ pip install git+https://github.com/hex-plex/Model-Extraction-Attacks-Video-Classification ## Latest development

Usage

Simple snippet explaining the usage :

BlackBox Extraction

# Black Box Victim: SwinT, Student: ViViT, Generator: Tgan

from vidmodex.models import ViViT as Student
from vidmodex.models import SwinT as Victim
from vidmodex.generator import Tgan as Generator

custom_config = {}
custom_config["num_classes"] = 400

blackbox_main(custom_config)

GreyBox Extraction

# Grey Box Victim: SwinT, Student: ViViT, Generator: Tgan, Dataset: Kinetics 400

from vidmodex.models import ViViT as Student
from vidmodex.models import SwinT as Victim
from vidmodex.generator import Tgan as Generator

custom_config = {}
custom_config["csv_file"] = "ENTER-THE-LOCATION-OF-DATA-CSV"
custom_config["root_dir"] = "ENTER-THE-LOCATION-OF-DATA-ROOT"
custom_config["ucf_gan_weights"] = "ENTER-THE-LOCATION-OF-UCF-WEIGHTS" or "state_normal81000.ckpt"
custom_config["num_classes"] = 400

greybox_main(custom_config)

References

[1] ViViT: A Video Vision Transformer [https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.15691] [cs.CV] 1 Nov 2021

[2] MoViNets: Mobile Video Networks for Efficient Video Recognition [https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.11511] [cs.CV] 18 Apr 2021

[3] Swin Transformer: Hierarchical Vision Transformer using Shifted Windows [https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.14030] [cs.CV] 17 Aug 2021

[4] Temporal Generative Adversarial Nets with Singular Value Clipping [https://arxiv.org/abs/1611.06624] [cs.LG] 18 Aug 2017

[5] Data-Free Model Extraction [https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.14779] [cs.LG] 31 Mar 2021

[6] MAZE: Data-Free Model Stealing Attack Using Zeroth-Order Gradient Estimation [https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.03161] [stat.ML] 6 May 2020

[7] Robustness and Diversity Seeking Data-Free Knowledge Distillation [https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.03749] [cs.LG] 10 Feb 2021
